entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
